item.title: 10 Early Superhero Movies Every Superhero Fan Needs To Watch
item.description: The earliest superhero movies are largely to thank for the gargantuan success of the genre today and deserve another watch from superhero fans.

item.title: Back To The Futureâ€™s Forgotten Sequel Gave The DeLorean Its Most Advanced Upgrade
item.description: Back to the Future surprisingly has a forgotten sequel that not only continued Doc Brown & Marty's story but also gave the DeLorean a new upgrade.

item.title: How Key John Doe Se7en Scene Was Fixed In 4K Re-Release Detailed By David Fincher
item.description: Director David Fincher reveals how he was able to fix a key John Doe scene in Se7en while handling the restoration for the movie's 4K re-release.
